permissionNoGems.title: Make Tari Universe better
permissionNoGems.text: Tari Universe would like to use analytics to improve your experience.

claimModalTitle: EARN REWARDS FOR MINING ON TESTNET
claimModalText: Earn gems by mining and referring friends! The more gems you earn, the larger your Tari airdrop! Have a referral code? Enter it below and earn {{gems}} bonus gems!
claimModalFinePrint: Please note: claiming gems turns on analytics so we can improve Universe
topTooltipText: Get a Tari Airdrop by collecting gems. The more gems you earn, the larger your airdrop.
